casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Julio TORRES Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided April 26, 2017

James B. Streeto, senior assistant public defender, in support of the petition.

Bruce R. Lockwood, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

On consideration of the defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 168 Conn.App. 611, 148 A.3d 238 (2016), it is ordered as follows:

*619"Granted as to the defendant's claim of plain error and denied as to all other questions presented for review. It is further ordered that upon the defendant's filing of the certified appeal pursuant to Practice Book § 84-9, the case is remanded to the Appellate Court with direction to consider the defendant's claim of plain error in light of State v. McClain, 324 Conn. 802, 155 A.3d 209 (2017)."
